Sweeper

A Visual Studio Add-in for C# Code Formatting - Visual Studio 2008, 2010, 2012, and 2013

Project Description
Sweeper is a Visual Studio 2008, 2010, 2012, and 2013 add-in for C# that automates many of the trivial code-formatting issues that developers run into.

Current Features:
  • A UI for options, Enable or disable any specific task you want to.
  • A decent list of formatting tasks automatically fixes many stylecop issues.
  • The ability to call other formatting-related addins after completion of a task - currently StyleCop and GhostDoc

It installs off a single MSI which does all the work. Simply install it and it will add the appropriate commands to the "Tools" menu (May need to restart Visual Studio). The installer will automatically install for any version of Visual Studio amongst the 2008, 2010, 2012, and 2013 releases.

Please keep in mind this is an BETA. I appreciate any testing you can do - especially over large codebases, but please be smart about it. I've run this over very large projects without issues. Also keep in mind that running stylecop saves your files.


This addin is only for Visual Studio 2008, 2010, 2012, and 2013 on C# projects.
